title: Lag spikes
body:
I got many lag spikes on games, I never had them before, network seems fine for me. I saw something on Network logs,

2017-03-12T20-48-40: loss = number of packets lost. Can indicate lags.  Some node on the network is dropping packets or taking to long and we have to resend them.
2017-03-12T20-48-40: sent = number of packets sent. Spikes can indicate lag.
2017-03-12T20-48-40: ping = how long it takes for a packet to get back and forth. Spikes can indicate lag.
2017-03-12T20-48-40: variance = how much the ping is changing from avg ping. Spikes can indicate lag.
2017-03-12T20-48-40: reliable delayed = This occurs when we drop reliable packets from sending this frame because we are sending to much data. Unreliable are more likely to be dropped than reliable.
2017-03-12T20-48-40: unreliable delayed = This occurs when we drop unreliable packets from sending this frame because we are sending to much data.
2017-03-12T20-48-40: app update delayed = This occurs when the app is taking to long to run code caused by network packets (ie CPU) and packets are delayed until the next frame
2017-03-12T20-48-40: Time spent in critical section (frame) = This is the time the network thread is blocking the main thread from doing anything.
2017-03-12T20-48-40: [time], [address], [incoming], [outgoing], [app_ctos], [app_stoc], [loss], [sent], [ping], [variance], [reliable delayed], [unreliable delayed], [app update delayed], [Time spent in critical section (frame)]

Seems something wrong for me, I run log reader and resuts:

Anyone could help me?

replies.body:
Were you getting these lag spikes in every game you tried playing? Did you notice any changes in your FPS or ping while playing? 

I'll be able to better help you with more information.

Here is I saved video where it happens:

1) https://youtu.be/rLJHJB2GQBQ
2) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GLVHZp6vn-A

From watching the videos of the your lag spikes, it seems like this is mostly likely due to an unstable connection between your network and our game servers. Follow our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and you should be able to find the root of the issue. 

Feel free to let me know if you have any questions!
Submited a ticket, hope will get help

Read everything, and downloaded hextech repair, run it and nothing wrong. But this game still lags meanwhile I don't lag in Battlefield 1, Playerunknown Battleground, and CS:GO. I uninstalled and installed again, still having lag spikes. 

I never had them before update that came up approximately three weeks ago.

Man, I paid a lot of money to this game and lagging like hell, not able to play, scared to play ranked,  but I still love this game.

Can I have direct support or something that possible could fix my problem, calling provider is pointless because I have 53 ms and don't have lags in other games, I think it is between my client and server.
I am getting it in every game, I tried to turn off the firewall still does not help, on other games I do not have these issues.
